scripts.uglify:js: chalk blue '=> uglifying JS' && uglifyjs -c -m -o build/immybox.min.js -- build/immybox.js && chalk green 'Done!'
scripts.build:css: chalk blue '=> compiling scss to css' && node-sass src/immybox.scss --output-style expanded > build/immybox.css && chalk green 'Done!'
scripts.build:js: chalk blue '=> transpiling ES6' && webpack && chalk green 'Done!'
scripts.build: npm run build:css -s && npm run build:js -s && npm run uglify:js -s
scripts.lint: chalk blue '=> linting' && eslint src && chalk green 'All good!'
scripts.watch: chalk blue '=> building on changes to /src' && watch 'npm run lint -s && npm run build -s' src
scripts.watch:lint: chalk blue '=> linting on changes to /src' && watch 'npm run lint -s' src
